original_text:
“If I have rejected the cause of my manservant or my maidservant,
    when they brought a complaint against me,
korean_text: 만일 남종이나 여종이 나와 더불어 쟁론할 때에 내가 그의 권리를 저버렸다면

sentences.original_text: If I have rejected the cause of my manservant or my maidservant,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 내가 내 남종이나 여종의 송사를 물리쳤다면,

sentences.original_text: when they brought a complaint against me,
